# Changelog

All notable changes to `plugin_name` will be documented in this file.

## v1.0.1 - 2023-03-24

- Remove `wordpress-plugin` as a package type.

## v1.0.0 - 2022-07-30

- Removing Mantle as a dependency to fix a circular dependency.

## v0.1.0 - 2022-07-27

Initial release.

## 0.1.0 - 2022-07-26

- Initial release
